title: Children (TEFC)
brief_description: Part two of the series, “The Family of Man” which sets out to compare family life in five different locations around the world. This programme shows the relationship between mothers and children, paternal influence and the use of mother substitutes, education and the preparation of children for adult life in traditional and modern settings in 1970.
